trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SEQ_00<tab>Seigetsu the Enlightened seems agitated.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the earnest Namazu.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to the earnest Namazu.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SEQ_03<tab>Report to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the earnest Namazu.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> east of Mol Iloh)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> southeast of Mol Iloh)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> in Hak Khaal)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the earnest Namazu)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_TODO_02<tab>Report to Seigetsu the Enlightened.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_000<tab>Have you perchance encountered my errand boy? Grey, rotund fellow with a vacant gaze? No? I dispatched him with orders to procure additional happi materials some time ago, but have seen neither fin nor barbel of him since.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_001<tab>You surely recognize that I cannot waste my talents tracking wayward lackeys─the festival would collapse into uncivilized chaos were I to neglect my intellectual endeavors for but a moment. If you are not otherwise engaged, can you search for him in my stead?

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_002<tab>His sojourn should have brought him to Mol Iloh, so you are likely to find him in the vicinity. If you discover him to have encountered complications, I trust you will ameliorate the situation.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_010<tab>Woe, woe is me! I have encountered complications. If only someone would ameliorate them...
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_011<tab>Oh! What a surprise to see you here, standing in silence mere ilms away. Yes, yes. Please never do it again.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_012<tab>I was absorbed in thought, you see. I had promised to trade with the Mol for materials we can use in our festive happi, and brought some fincrafted fineries along for this purpose. But then, when I least expected it...

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_013<tab>...I was trampled by a charging dzo! It had dashed several malms by the time I regained my normal shape and the ability to walk. Yes, yes. I eventually discovered it devouring the last of my fineries.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_014<tab>...A flock of yol swooped down upon me! Luckily, I was able to liberate myself from their talons. Yes, yes. Less luckily, we were at least a malm in the air by then. By the time I regained solid ground and consciousness, my fineries were gone.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_015<tab>...I noticed several Buduga in pursuit! Hoping they would take my fineries instead of my life, I threw them behind me and ran. Yes, yes. Tossed them one and all.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_016<tab>I have no choice but to remake what I have lost. But I am only one Namazu, and require many fineries for trade. Will you lend me a fin?
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_017<tab>Specifically, I find myself in need of more nails. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the materials, so take whatever you need from this box.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_018<tab>Specifically, I find myself in need of more thick fabric. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the materials, so take whatever you need from this box.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_019<tab>Specifically, I find myself in need of more lubricating oil. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the ingredients, so take whatever you need from this box.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_020<tab>Specifically, I find myself in need of more steppe mica. Yes, yes. Can you bring me three fairly large chunks? I have had success finding deposits east of Mol Iloh.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_021<tab>Specifically, I find myself in need of more steppe safflower. Yes, yes. Can you harvest some? I have had success looking in the lush patches southeast of Mol Iloh.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_022<tab>Specifically, I find myself in need of another khaal crab. Yes, yes. Can you bring me one? I have had success fishing for them with a bit of salmon roe in Hak Khaal.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_023<tab>Please return to me when you are ready. I will craft the finest of fineries, yes, yes.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_024<tab>Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_025<tab>Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_026<tab>Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SYSTEM_000_027<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SYSTEM_000_028<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_034<tab>Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_035<tab>Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_036<tab>Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_040<tab>Did everything go to plan? Are all of your assorted fingers intact?
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_041<tab>Thank you, thank you! I will fashion these into fineries and deliver them to the Mol forthwith.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_042<tab>Can I trouble you to relay my tribulations to Seigetsu the Enlightened? He doubtless wonders about the delay.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_DAILYNAMAZUO03103_000_043<tab>Stay safe. And do not get killed!
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_KOFUINSEIGETSU_100_050<tab>I take it you return with information?
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_050<tab>Hm. Precisely as I imagined.
TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_051<tab>He is a hardworking fellow, but a veritable beacon for misfortune. I daresay his poor luck alone could bring about the Namazu's annihilation.

TEXT_BANNAM301_03103_KOFUINSEIGETSU_000_052<tab>As for you, I have no doubt that your efforts this day will have a profound effect on the outcome of our festival, and contribute to the enlightenment of Namazu one and all. Probably.
